verbs.description: [V: softball] [ARG0: scuffle] leads to gun threats in norwalk a stamford man landed in police custody after threatening to shoot an opposing player in the head during a blowout softball loss police said the softball game was being played at calf pasture beach around 10 p m friday when the short stop on the losing team began acting out police said the short stop elvin caban 28 of bedford street stamford was yelling at teammates when a player on the other team who was up at bat reportedly told him you stink caban attempted to rush the batter police said but was held back by teammates police spokesman lt paul resnick said it was then that the 28-year - old threatened to shoot the man in the head with hollow point bullets as a result caban was ejected from the game norwalk elvin caban cabans stamford softball caban stamford
